name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Donera - Turn tabs into money for the planet

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Raise money for Climate Change. 100% real impact. 100% transparent. 100% secure.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Raise money for climate change with every browser tab you open!

Raise money for climate change with every tab you open in Chrome! Just by surfing the web, you can raise money for the best carbon offsets, advocacy organizations, and research groups in the world. 100% free, 100% of the time.

Donera transforms your "new tab" page. Each time you open a tab, you will be greeted with our custom Donera homepage. We collect ad revenue from the page and use it to donate to top charities.

We're democratizing the climate change movement so anyone can participate. Join us and download today!

HOW MUCH IMPACT WILL I HAVE?
-------------------------
Just a little change can have a huge impactâ€“an average user can offset 50kg of CO2 a year, all with regular browsing behavior

IS DONERA PRIVATE? WILL YOU SELL MY DATA?
-------------------------
Donera never tracks your information or sells your data. We believe in total privacy for all
